titles.title: A bill to convey certain Oregon and California Railroad Grant Lands in Josephine County, Oregon, to the Rogue Community College District.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Josephine County, Oregon, to the Rogue Community College District. Reserves mineral rights to the United States. Provides for reversion of such land to the United States if it is used for other than educational purposes.
